content: Someone should clean it up, but here is what we have so far.

content:
## Refunds and Billing

Refunds are available only within **14 days** of the original purchase.
originalSentence:
## Refunds and Billing

Refunds are available only within **14 days** of the original purchase.

content: Refunds are possible only if **no boards were created at all** (literally zero activity).
originalSentence: Refunds are possible only if **no boards were created at all** (literally zero activity).

content: Customers must also provide **proof of payment** (for example, a receipt).
originalSentence: Customers must also provide **proof of payment** (for example, a receipt).

content: If the account has already renewed, then **no refunds are available**.
originalSentence: If the account has already renewed, then **no refunds are available**.

content: Refunds for **team plans** (bulk license purchases) might be handled on a **case by case basis**.
originalSentence: Refunds for **team plans** (bulk license purchases) might be handled on a **case by case basis**.

content: For these requests, customers should contact **finance@monday.fake**.
originalSentence: For these requests, customers should contact **finance@monday.fake**.

content: - Cancelling does **not** mean they will receive money back for the current billing cycle.
originalSentence: - Cancelling does **not** mean they will receive money back for the current billing cycle.

content: - The cancellation only stops billing at the **next renewal date**.
originalSentence: - The cancellation only stops billing at the **next renewal date**.

content: - If you cancel in the middle of the cycle, billing continues until renewal, then stops.
originalSentence: - If you cancel in the middle of the cycle, billing continues until renewal, then stops.

content: - No refunds are issued for unused time in the current cycle.
originalSentence: - No refunds are issued for unused time in the current cycle.

content:
## Passwords and Security

- Passwords must be **changed every 90 days**.
originalSentence:
## Passwords and Security

- Passwords must be **changed every 90 days**.

content: - Passwords should **not be shared with coworkers** under any circumstances.
originalSentence: - Passwords should **not be shared with coworkers** under any circumstances.

content: - If a user forgets their password, the reset process is done through an **email link**.
originalSentence: - If a user forgets their password, the reset process is done through an **email link**.

content: - **Two-factor authentication (2FA)** is recommended but not enforced.
originalSentence: - **Two-factor authentication (2FA)** is recommended but not enforced.

content:
## Support Information

- Official support email: **support@monday.fake**
- Standard SLA: **24–48 hours** response time
- If no answer is received within 48 hours, the request is **automatically escalated**.
originalSentence:
## Support Information

- Official support email: **support@monday.fake**
- Standard SLA: **24–48 hours** response time
- If no answer is received within 48 hours, the request is **automatically escalated**.

- Customer service hours: **09:00–18:00 UTC**
- Old documents sometimes state hours as 08:00–17:00, but those are outdated.
originalSentence:
- Customer service hours: **09:00–18:00 UTC**
- Old documents sometimes state hours as 08:00–17:00, but those are outdated.

content: - There is **no appeal process** for chargeback bans.
originalSentence: - There is **no appeal process** for chargeback bans.

content: - Shipping is **not offered at all**, because monday.
originalSentence: - Shipping is **not offered at all**, because monday.

content: com is a digital-only product.
originalSentence: com is a digital-only product.

content: - There are no boxes, hardware, or physical shipping involved.
originalSentence: - There are no boxes, hardware, or physical shipping involved.

content: - Refunds for **team plans** are handled case by case.
originalSentence: - Refunds for **team plans** are handled case by case.

content: Contact **finance@monday.fake**.
originalSentence: Contact **finance@monday.fake**.

content:
## Features Mentioned

- **Boards**: The main workspace for tasks and projects.
originalSentence:
## Features Mentioned

content: - **Team plan**: Bulk license or multi-user management.

content:
## Summary Table

| Section     | Rule / Info                         |
|-------------|-------------------------------------|
| Refund      | 14 days, no boards created          |
| Cancel      | Anytime, no refund current cycle    |
| Passwords   | Must change every 90 days           |
| Support     | support@monday.fake, 24–48h response|
| Chargebacks | Account banned                      |
| Hours       | 09:00–18:00 UTC                     |

## Support Information

- Official support email: **support@monday.fake**
- Standard SLA: **24–48 hours** response time
- If no answer is received within 48 hours, the request is **automatically escalated**. - Customer service hours: **09:00–18:00 UTC**
- Old documents sometimes state hours as 08:00–17:00, but those are outdated. ~~~json
{
  "support": {
    "contact": "support@monday.fake",
    "hours": "09:00–18:00 UTC",
    "sla": "24h–48h response",
    "escalation": "automatic after 48h no reply"
  }
}
~~~

## Special Notes

- If a customer issues a **chargeback** with their bank or credit card provider, their account is **banned immediately and permanently**.

## Special Notes

- If a customer issues a **chargeback** with their bank or credit card provider, their account is **banned immediately and permanently**.

content: # monday.com Policy Document (draft v0.7?)
originalSentence: # monday.com Policy Document (draft v0.7?)

content: This document is not final. It is messy, contains repeated information, and mixes formats. Someone should clean it up, but here is what we have so far.
originalSentence: This document is not final. It is messy, contains repeated information, and mixes formats. Someone should clean it up, but here is what we have so far.

content: ## Refunds and Billing
originalSentence: ## Refunds and Billing

content:
Refunds are available only within **14 days** of the original purchase.  
Refunds are possible only if **no boards were created at all** (literally zero activity).  
Customers must also provide **proof of payment** (for example, a receipt).
originalSentence:
Refunds are available only within **14 days** of the original purchase.  
Refunds are possible only if **no boards were created at all** (literally zero activity).  
Customers must also provide **proof of payment** (for example, a receipt).

content: If the account has already renewed, then **no refunds are available**.
originalSentence: If the account has already renewed, then **no refunds are available**.

content:
Refunds for **team plans** (bulk license purchases) might be handled on a **case by case basis**.  
For these requests, customers should contact **finance@monday.fake**.
originalSentence:
Refunds for **team plans** (bulk license purchases) might be handled on a **case by case basis**.  
For these requests, customers should contact **finance@monday.fake**.

content: ## Subscriptions and Cancellations
originalSentence: ## Subscriptions and Cancellations

content:
- Customers can cancel their subscription at **any time** in account settings.
- Cancelling does **not** mean they will receive money back for the current billing cycle.
- The cancellation only stops billing at the **next renewal date**.
- If you cancel in the middle of the cycle, billing continues until renewal, then stops.
- No refunds are issued for unused time in the current cycle.
originalSentence:
- Customers can cancel their subscription at **any time** in account settings.
- Cancelling does **not** mean they will receive money back for the current billing cycle.
- The cancellation only stops billing at the **next renewal date**.
- If you cancel in the middle of the cycle, billing continues until renewal, then stops.
- No refunds are issued for unused time in the current cycle.

content: ## Passwords and Security
originalSentence: ## Passwords and Security

content:
- Passwords must be **changed every 90 days**.
- Passwords should **not be shared with coworkers** under any circumstances.
- If a user forgets their password, the reset process is done through an **email link**.
- **Two-factor authentication (2FA)** is recommended but not enforced.
originalSentence:
- Passwords must be **changed every 90 days**.
- Passwords should **not be shared with coworkers** under any circumstances.
- If a user forgets their password, the reset process is done through an **email link**.
- **Two-factor authentication (2FA)** is recommended but not enforced.

content: ## Support Information
originalSentence: ## Support Information

content:
- Official support email: **support@monday.fake**
- Standard SLA: **24–48 hours** response time
- If no answer is received within 48 hours, the request is **automatically escalated**.
- Customer service hours: **09:00–18:00 UTC**
- Old documents sometimes state hours as 08:00–17:00, but those are outdated.
originalSentence:
- Official support email: **support@monday.fake**
- Standard SLA: **24–48 hours** response time
- If no answer is received within 48 hours, the request is **automatically escalated**.
- Customer service hours: **09:00–18:00 UTC**
- Old documents sometimes state hours as 08:00–17:00, but those are outdated.

content:
- If a customer issues a **chargeback** with their bank or credit card provider, their account is **banned immediately and permanently**.
- There is **no appeal process** for chargeback bans.
- Shipping is **not offered at all**, because monday.com is a digital-only product.
- There are no boxes, hardware, or physical shipping involved.
- Refunds for **team plans** are handled case by case. Contact **finance@monday.fake**.

- If a customer issues a **chargeback** with their bank or credit card provider, their account is **banned immediately and permanently**.
- There is **no appeal process** for chargeback bans.
- Shipping is **not offered at all**, because monday.com is a digital-only product.
- There are no boxes, hardware, or physical shipping involved.
- Refunds for **team plans** are handled case by case. Contact **finance@monday.fake**.
